Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and Sox-35 and Sox-35th and 63rd due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and Sox-35 and Sox-35th and 63rd due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Roosevelt, and,
  • between 63rd and 95th, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Roosevelt and 63rd/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#29 State

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are rerouted via 111th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th over regular route: due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th over regular route: due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.
